Of course there are other ways to do it, but this is pretty Pythonic; it's one, obvious way to do the job.
AMQP is recommended though since it's more reliable

@mjamesruggiero if you ever want a asynchronous and/or distributed task queue and you're using python, you'll probably want to use celery ... reason I ask about web dev is it's a very common use case (Celery was originally developed for use with Django)
anybody looking at this diagram right now will understand why Celery is so great once they see its api
Celery doesn't have to use AMQP, it can use other messaging brokers
